entries.content: Found UI streamer render delay in ChunkProcessor.js:85-91. Currently set to 100ms timeout after final result chunk before triggering auto-completion. This delay ensures all text has been rendered before completion event fires.
Changed UI streamer render delay from 100ms to 250ms in ChunkProcessor.js:91. User (Moti) requested this change to allow more buffer time before auto-completion event fires after final result chunk.
